1.name: Wasteland Whopper
1.description: A fiery double-patty burger with molten cheese and secret bunker sauce.

2.name: Skyfire Chicken Wrap
2.description: Grilled chicken wrapped with zesty greens and a tangy blast of flavor.

3.name: Metro Melt Sandwich
3.description: Sizzling roast beef, caramelized onions, and cheddar melted to perfection.

4.name: Sunburst Veggie Bowl
4.description: A fresh, vibrant medley of greens, grains, and solar-kissed veggies.

5.name: Ironclad Fries
5.description: Armor-crisp fries seasoned with bunker-forged spices and sea salt.

6.name: Neon Rush Lemonade
6.description: An electrifying lemonade charged with a hint of wild berry.

7.name: Nuka Cola
7.description: An intense and premium soft drink , blending bold flavor with a signature radioactive kick that defines post-apocalyptic luxury.

8.name: Starfall Sundae
8.description: Vanilla ice cream, meteor fudge drizzle, and stardust sprinkles.

9.name: Velvet Eclipse Cake
9.description: Rich velvet cake cloaked in a dark chocolate cosmic glaze.

10.name: Blastbite Nachos
10.description: Tortilla chips piled high with molten cheese, spicy beans, and fusion salsa.

11.name: The End Dog
11.description: A post-apocalyptic hot dog loaded with spicy bunker relish, smoked sausage, and atomic mustard.

12.name: Meltdown Mac
12.description: Creamy mac and cheese infused with molten pepperjack, topped with crispy fallout bacon.
